summary: Implements the core persistence layer for the TagStudio application using SQLAlchemy. It defines a Library class that handles opening, initializing, and interacting with the SQLite database, including CRUD operations for entries, tags, folders, tag aliases, and user preferences, as well as backup, import/export, and search functionality. Supporting classes track library opening status and encapsulate paginated search results, while utility functions provide default tag handling and slug generation.
business_intent: Enable reliable storage, retrieval, and manipulation of tagged media items, allowing users to organize content, apply hierarchical tags, configure preferences, and perform efficient searches within a robust, versionâ€‘controlled database.
